hypernets_processor.data_io.hypernets_writer module¶

HypernetsWriter class

class hypernets_processor.data_io.hypernets_writer.HypernetsWriter¶

Bases: object

Class to write Hypernets output files

static create_file_name_l1(network, site, time, version)¶

Return a valid file name for Hypernets Level 1 file

Parameters

  • network (str) – abbreviated network name

  • site (str) – abbreviated site name

  • time (datetime.datetime) – acquisition time

  • version (str) – processing version

Returns

fname str

Level 1 filename

static create_template_dataset_l1(n_wavelengths, n_series, network)¶

Returns empty Hypernets Level 1 dataset to be populated with data

Parameters

  • n_wavelengths (int) – number of wavelengths

  • n_series – number of series

  • network – Hypernets network, “land” or “water”

Returns

dataset xarray.Dataset

Empty dataset

dataset xarray.Dataset

static write(dataset, path, overwrite=False, fmt='netCDF4', compression_level=None)¶

Write xarray dataset to file

Parameters

  • dataset (xarray.Dataset) – dataset

  • path (str) – file path

  • overwrite (bool) – set to true to overwrite existing file

  • fmt (str) – format to write to, may be ‘netCDF4’ or ‘csv’

  • compression_level (int) – the file compression level if ‘netCDF4’ fmt, 0 - 9 (default is 5)
